content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Mr. Trabelsi, thank you for your interest in my apartment. I am glad you are here to discuss the rental price. May I ask if you have any specific requirements or preferences for the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Yes, I would like to know the rental price. How much is it per month?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: The rental price for my apartment is negotiable, but I am looking for a fair and reasonable price that will reflect the value of the property. I am open to discussing different options and finding a mutually beneficial agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Sure, I would like to know the rental price. Can you give me an idea of what you are looking for?

Also, do you have any other requirements or preferences for the tenant?

Thank you for your time.

I agree to the price of x Euro.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: I am looking for a rental price that is fair and reasonable, based on the value of the property and the local market conditions. As for other requirements, I would prefer a responsible and reliable tenant who will take care of the property and pay rent on time. Thank you for your interest in my apartment, and I look forward to hearing back from you.
name: Heinrich Heine
